references.reason: This book provides the foundational mathematical framework for M-concave functions, which are central to the paper's topic.
This paper introduces the concept of M-concave functions and their properties, laying the groundwork for the online maximization problems explored in this paper.
This book is a comprehensive reference on bandit algorithms, which are essential for the stochastic bandit setting analyzed in this paper.
This book is a standard reference for combinatorial optimization problems, providing the necessary background for proving the NP-hardness result in this paper.

references.paper_title: An analysis of approximations for maximizing submodular set functions-I
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work on submodular functions, whose relationship to M-concave functions is discussed and used in the paper's analysis.
